section.heading: Attendance of witnesses — Wilful false swearing.
section.text: Any wilful false swearing on the part of any witness before any trial board mentioned in § 5-1001 as to any material fact shall be deemed perjury and shall be punished in the manner prescribed by law for such offense.

annotations.annotation: Insanitary buildings, condemnation, condemnation review board, see § 6-902.
